segments.text: I’m shocked by how calm everything looks outside while the kitchen is in chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is so peaceful and tidy, but inside, it’s a different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and the stool is about to tip—it’s all happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far up, and the stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it’s a normal day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is just amazing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away because I need to see how this all plays out.
segments.speaker: PAR
